table.title: Datamodel Summary Usage by Model Title

search.query: search type=data_model_acceleration | fields name, total_bucket_count, total_size | rename name AS "Model Title", total_bucket_count AS "Bucket Count", total_size AS "Cumulative Usage (MB)"

table.title: Report Acceleration Usage by Search Name

search.query: search type!=data_model_acceleration | fields name, total_bucket_count, total_size | rename name AS "Search Name", total_bucket_count AS "Bucket Count", total_size AS "Cumulative Usage"

chart.title: Datamodel Summary Usage by Indexer Host

search.query: search type=data_model_acceleration | stats sum(total_size) AS Usage by splunk_server | rename splunk_server AS Indexer

chart.title: Report Acceleration Summary Usage by Indexer Host

search.query: search type!=data_model_acceleration | stats sum(total_size) AS Usage by splunk_server | rename splunk_server AS Indexer

chart.title: Datamodel Summary Usage by Search Head

search.query: search type=data_model_acceleration | stats sum(total_size) AS Usage by search_head_guid | join type=left search_head_guid [| rest /services/server/info | rename guid AS search_head_guid ] | eval shead=coalesce(splunk_server, search_head_guid) | rename shead AS "Search Head" | fields "Search Head", Usage

chart.title: Report Acceleration Summary Usage by Search Head

search.query: search type!=data_model_acceleration | stats sum(total_size) AS Usage by search_head_guid | join type=left search_head_guid [| rest /services/server/info | rename guid AS search_head_guid ] | rename search_head_guid AS "Search Head"
